@MitZep
Your movie configuration is unique. There is no encoder out there who keeps this config. This config looks good on 32" LED too. If you increase the quality, bitrate increases, and so the size and there are "lot of encoders out doing the same or nearly same configs". 
I think your previous rips are suitable for wide range of people. So please keep your previous configuration and maintain your uniqueness. Its always difficult to download big files with restricted bandwidth.
You can keep video bitrate upto 1200 kbps max and audio is upto your choice. And im in favor of 480p for smaller movies.
You can encode bigger size movies on demand rather than smaller on demand.
Wrote a lot of suggestion coz i/we love your encodes and dont want you to change the configs any more. I wish you consider it.
PLZ stay with ur original quality
ya...PLZZZ stay with your original quality and size
I think 1000-1100 was perfect enough. 'Maybe' you could set a higher bitrate for the audio, but I think it was clear enough at your earlier settings too.
